sentences.en: 70 jobs have been reprieved until next April.
sentences.cn: 有70个职位暂时保留到明年四月份。

sentences.en: Each female will lay just one egg in April or May.
sentences.cn: 每个雌体四五月份只产一粒卵。

sentences.en: In April 1944 he was killed on active service.
Interest is calculated daily and credited once a year, on 1 April.
sentences.cn: 利息按天计算，每年4月1日一次性打入账户。

sentences.en: It's extremely rare for it to be this hot in April.
sentences.cn: 四月份就这样炎热是极其罕见的。

sentences.en: Millions of wild flowers colour the valleys, especially in April and May.
sentences.cn: 尤其是在四五月份，不计其数的野花盛开，山谷里一片绚烂色彩。

sentences.en: On 2 April 1916 air - raid warnings sounded throughout Edinburgh.
sentences.cn: 1916年4月2日空袭警报响彻了整个爱丁堡.
从4月1号到10月31号每天营业。

sentences.en: She was born in London on April 29, 1923.
Supergroup U2 will appear at Wembley Stadium on April 20.
sentences.cn: 4月20日，超人气乐团 U2将现身温布利体育场。

sentences.en: The changes will be introduced in April.
The present assembly will be dissolved on April 30th.
sentences.cn: 现在的议会将于4月30日解散。

sentences.en: The ship will be completed for sea by April.
sentences.cn: 这艘船到四月份将造好下水.

sentences.en: The vessel docked at Liverpool in April 1811.
sentences.cn: 这艘轮船于1811年4月在利物浦靠岸。

sentences.en: They were married on 7 April 1927 at Paddington Register Office.
sentences.cn: 他们于1927年4月7日在帕丁顿登记处注册结婚。

sentences.en: This past April while visiting my parents on the farm I’d grown up on, I wandered outside to drink in the feel of “home”, a comfort I really needed right then.
sentences.cn: 刚刚过去的那个四月，我回到我在那长大的农场探望我的父母。 我在屋外漫步，沉浸在“家”的舒适感觉中——当时我真的很需要家的慰藉。

sentences.en: You can paint, do repairs, and if you have already hired contractors in April or earlier, continue to work on your plans.
sentences.cn: 你可以涂涂油漆，做点小修补，如果你已经在四月或更加之前就已经雇到承包商的话，按原计划进行没关系。

phrases.tran_cn: 愚人节；愚人节中受愚弄者

trans.tran_en: the fourth month of the year, between March and May
the fourth month of the year, between March and May
